pr_title: Changed recommendations and Tenant config Cache

timeline.message:
Changed recommendations and Tenant config Cache

Previously when getting the both cached, a method in APIUtil was used.
Cache creation and get cache were written in same method and this might
lead to several issues as errors in expiry times. With this change, cache
is created separately at server start and tenant creation.

Signed-off-by: Lakshitha Gunasekara <lakshitha.gunasekara@gmail.com>
